title: Ranked bug
body: I just got into my Plat IV promos, and I had played 2 games after reaching 100lp. I won one and lost one, so I should still have a third chance to reach Plat IV but for some reason, immediately after losing in the 2nd game, I was told that I was unsuccessful in my promotion. Can someone fix this please, I wont play another Solo/Duo until I receive some feedback.

replies.body:
Did you happen to dodge at *any point* during your promos? If you did, it would have counted as a loss in your promos and would have resulted in the loss in this instance.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Before I played the second game played I was in a champ select, I was the 2nd ban pick on our team, and during the last 8 seconds I clicked to ban Soraka, the button stopped glowing but Soraka still wasn't banned and I was returned to the lobby with a 5 minute timer. I didn't mind waiting 5 minutes so I just scrolled on my phone thinking it was a small bug. I didn't realize it results in a loss in promotion games since it never happened to me before.

That would be the "dodge" that caused your promo series to end, then. 

If you experience that sort of issue again, please let me know so we can work together to troubleshoot the cause.
